name: SLOTS - Circus Deluxe Casino! FREE Vegas Slot Machine Games of the Grand Jackpot Palace!
name_original: SLOTS - Circus Deluxe Casino! FREE Vegas Slot Machine Games of the Grand Jackpot Palace!
description:
SLOTS - Circus Deluxe Casino is the #1 free-to-play Slots Game!

DOWNLOAD NOW and instantly receive 10,000 Free Bonus Credits!

Make a fortune with MEGA Payouts, Free Bonus Credits, Mini Games and more! Get ready to play Slots featuring HD 3D art and animations only seen before on real slot machines in the best casinos!

Bigger Bets = Bigger Wins!!!

Just 'tap' to Spin!

Premium features include:
- Beautiful HD Graphics
- 5 reels with up to 30 lines!
- FREE daily Credits!
- 3 deluxe mini-games to max your payouts!
- No internet connection required to play!
- Game Center integration - Compete against your friends and show them who's boss!

Good luck, and enjoy!
